```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
```


## Text

```{r}
text <- c("Because I could not stop for Death -",
          "He kindly stopped for me -",
          "The Carriage held but just Ourselves -",
          "and Immortality")

text
```

## A tidy table

```{r}
text_df <- tibble(line = 1:4, text = text)

text_df
```


## Todenization

```{r}
text_df %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)
```
